sentences.en: Loss of weight is directly proportional to the rate at which the disease is progressing.
sentences.cn: 体重的下降与病情发展的速度成正比。

sentences.en: One very important feature of pseudo forces is that they are always proportional to the masses.
sentences.cn: 赝力的一非常重要的特征是,它们永远与质量成正比.

sentences.en: Other proportional feedback signals are generated from rate gyros.
sentences.cn: 其他的比例反馈讯号是由速率陀螺产生的.

sentences.en: Payment will be proportional to the amount of work done.
sentences.cn: 酬金将与工作量成比例.

sentences.en: Salary is proportional to years of experience.
The actual stress is not proportional to the bending moment.
sentences.cn: 实际上应力与弯矩不成正比.

sentences.en: The amount of food a child needs is roughly proportional to its size.
sentences.cn: 小孩需要的食物量与他的个头大致成比例.

sentences.en: The amount of force needed is inversely proportional to the rigidity of the material.
sentences.cn: 需要的力度与材料的硬度成反比.

sentences.en: The amount of scattering will thus be proportional to the number of electrons.
sentences.cn: 于是散射辅射的量将与电子数成正比.

sentences.en: The electrical section contains the solid - state proportional temperature controllers and solenoid valves.
sentences.cn: 电子控制室内有固体线路的比例温度控制器和电磁阀.

sentences.en: The fee charged by the realtor is directly proportional to the price of the property.
sentences.cn: 房产代理人收取的费用和房产价格是成正比的。

sentences.en: The increase of wages is proportional to the rise in prices.
sentences.cn: 工资的增长与物价的上涨是成比例的.

sentences.en: The output should be proportional to the input.
sentences.cn: 输出应当与输入成比例.

sentences.en: The size of the nebula at this stage is inversely proportional to its mass.
sentences.cn: 这个阶段星云的大小与其质量成反比。

sentences.en: The value of a fraction is inversely proportional to that of the denominator.
sentences.cn: 分数值与分母值成反比例.

words.tran_cn: 成比例的；相称的；均衡的
成比例的；相称的；适当的
成比例地；相称地，适当地

phrases.tran_cn: 比例阀；定量阀；流量阀；配合阀

trans.tran_cn: 比例的，成比例的，相称的，均衡的
trans.tran_en: something that is proportional to something else is in the correct or most suitable relationship to it in size, amount, importance etc
